meanings.definition: Fearlessness or bravery in the face of danger.
meanings.sent1: Her intrepidity in standing up to the bully inspired others to be brave.
meanings.sent2: The soldier's intrepidity in battle earned him a medal for bravery.
meanings.sent3: Despite her small size, the kitten showed intrepidity when facing the big dog.
meanings.sent4: The firefighter's intrepidity in rescuing the child from the burning building was heroic.
meanings.sent5: The explorer's intrepidity in venturing into the unknown jungle was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The quality of being resolutely courageous.
meanings.sent1: His intrepidity in pursuing his dreams despite obstacles was admirable.
meanings.sent2: The intrepidity of the activists in fighting for justice inspired many others to join the cause.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel showed intrepidity in stealing nuts from the bird feeder, undeterred by the risks.
meanings.sent4: The intrepidity of the mountain climber in scaling the treacherous peak was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The intrepidity of the young artist in experimenting with new techniques was truly inspiring.
